meanings.definition: The quality or state of being triangular.
meanings.sent1: The triangularity of the roof made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully studied the triangularity of the mountain peaks before painting.
meanings.sent3: The triangularity of the cake slices made them look like mini pyramids.
meanings.sent4: The triangularity of the situation became clearer as more information was revealed.
meanings.sent5: The triangularity of the kite soaring in the sky was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The shape or form of a triangle.
meanings.sent1: The playground had colorful slides with varying triangularity.
meanings.sent2: She admired the triangularity of the sail on the distant boat.
meanings.sent3: The triangularity of the pizza slices made them easy to share.
meanings.sent4: The triangularity of the building's architecture was striking against the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The triangularity of the road signs helped drivers navigate the intersection smoothly.
